text: I don't think I'm embellishing when I say like twenty or thirty hands shot up in the audience.

Then he goes: I want to do something different. Does anybody have a copy of a book of mine called "Jesus's Son?"
I forget what he was planning to read. Maybe a chunk of Train Dreams (fucking BRILLIANT). He looked out at the crowd and seemed to freeze.
